Class Server

    • Model.Server

  • public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
    Gère la partie serveur du programme

      • openServerSockets

        public void openServerSockets()
        Opens the server's sockets and establish a wait to establish a remote connection with a client

      • receiveMessage

        private void receiveMessage()
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Wait for a message to come through the channel, then returns it. It is synchronized because it if the message received is the file transmission code, it must wait for a second message to come through the channel (the file) before to give access to another thread that would wait for a normal message.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • startReceiveMessageThread

        public void startReceiveMessageThread()
        Creates and start a thread that wait for a message to come through the opened channel.

      • startReceiveFile

        private void startReceiveFile()
        Create and start a thread that manage the reception of a file

      • openUDPSocket

        public void openUDPSocket()
        Opens a UDP socket that is used to wait for broadcast messages.

      • receiveBroadcastRequests

        public void receiveBroadcastRequests(java.lang.String username)
        Receive broadcast messages from remote clients, and send back a username Used to be be shown as online to other users. Repeated each for refresh.
